attributes.action: Cooperate fully and honestly with a Treasury Select Committee enquiry into tax changes introduced by Gordon Brown in 1997,which have affected pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Treasury Select Committee is reported to be proposing an investigation into tax changes introduced by Gordon Brown in 1997,which have had a devastating effect on pensions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
